title: Caledonia
content:
Designed by [William Addison Dwiggins](http://web.archive.org/web/20140904160300/http:/typophile.com/wiki/William%20Addison%20Dwiggins) for [Megenthaler Linotype](http://web.archive.org/web/20140904160300/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Megenthaler%20Linotype) under the direction of [C. H. Griffith](http://web.archive.org/web/20140904160300/http:/typophile.com/wiki/C.%20H.%20Griffith) starting 2/2/37 through 10/25/48. Also known as Experimental 78.

Revived by Linotype in 1983 under the name [New Caledonia](http://web.archive.org/web/20140904160300/http:/www.linotype.com/1272/newcaledonia-family.html).
author: dan_reynolds
